comment: чек Perception на мертвых культистах, пытавшихся схватить Паскаля. Провал

languages.text: Мятежникам, прикидывавшимся безобидными калеками, не отказать в смекалке.
The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.
languages.original_text: Мятежникам, прикидывавшимся безобидными калеками, не отказать в смекалке.

traits.locale_text: The insurgents have been feigning grave bodily afflictions. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.
The insurgents have been feigning grave bodily afflictions. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.
The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.
The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.
The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.
The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.

languages.text: Die Aufständischen täuschen schwere Verletzungen vor. Eine einfallsreiche Methode, ungefährlich zu wirken, das muss man ihnen lassen.
languages.original_text: The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.

traits.locale_text: Die Aufständischen täuschen schwere Verletzungen vor. Eine einfallsreiche Methode, ungefährlich zu wirken, das muss man ihnen lassen.

languages.text: Certains rebelles simulaient des blessures graves... Ça leur permettait de paraître inoffensifs, c'est drôlement rusé !
languages.original_text: The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.

traits.locale_text: Certains rebelles simulaient des blessures graves... Ça leur permettait de paraître inoffensifs, c'est drôlement rusé !

languages.text: 这些叛乱分子假装受了重伤。这样一来，他们似乎看起来不会构成任何威胁。不得不说，这种伪装的方式还真是挺有创意的。
languages.original_text: The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.

traits.locale_text: 这些叛乱分子假装受了重伤。这样一来，他们似乎看起来不会构成任何威胁。不得不说，这种伪装的方式还真是挺有创意的。

languages.text: 反乱軍は重傷を負ったふりをしている。脅威を隠すために頭を使ったのだ。
languages.original_text: The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.

traits.locale_text: 反乱軍は重傷を負ったふりをしている。脅威を隠すために頭を使ったのだ。

languages.text: Los insurgentes han estado fingiendo heridas graves. Una forma ingeniosa de parecer poco amenazador, hay que reconocerlo.
languages.original_text: The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.

traits.locale_text: Los insurgentes han estado fingiendo heridas graves. Una forma ingeniosa de parecer poco amenazador, hay que reconocerlo.

languages.text: Asiler, ağır yara almış izlenimi veriyorlarmış meğer. Tehditkâr gözükmemek için yaratıcı bir taktik, takdir etmek gerekir.
languages.original_text: The insurgents have been feigning grave injuries. An inventive way to look unthreatening, one has to give them that.

traits.locale_text: Asiler, ağır darbe almış izlenimi veriyorlarmış meğer. Tehditkâr gözükmemek için yaratıcı bir taktik, takdir etmek gerekir.
